channel.title: Theiving timers
channel.description:
can i change how long it is before you can click the tables again?
now its like 10 seconds can i change it to for example 5 seconds??
can someone tell me lol?
(java knowledge = F, c++ = b...) :)

item.title: Theiving timers
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Haha I laughed at the ‘C++ = b’ part in your post, if you were a “B” at C++ you would be A++ at Java, seeing has C++ is an extremely complicated language when you compare it to Java, also a lot more of a “dangerous” language if you will.

item.title: Theiving timers
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

also it why is this wrong?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops") && (playerLevel[3] >= 45)) { if (playerLevel <= 45 == true) { sendMessage("you need 45hp+ to go shopping."); } else { teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3464; sendMessage("You teleport to the Shops!"); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 01:38:04 am[/size][hr]nvm it was ment to be if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops") && (playerLevel[3] >= 45)) { if (playerLevel[3] >= 45 == false) { sendMessage("Mate! 45+ hp to go shopping!"); } else { teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3464; sendMessage("You teleport to the Shops!"); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 01:49:17 am[/size][hr]can i change the attack timer of a weapons, how?

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving timers
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

case 4876: TheifStall("general stall", "and recieve 500k", 1, 70 * playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 15, 0x340); break;

I think it’s the 15 so change the 15 and see how long it is then.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving timers
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

wheres the timer? here’s the code but i don’t see a timer!!!

 case 4878:
            TheifStall("scimitar stall", "and recieve 2m", 40,
                    300 * playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 30, 0x340);
            break;

        case 4877:
            TheifStall("magic stall", "and recieve 1m", 20,
                    125 * playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 30, 0x340);
            break;

        case 4876:
            TheifStall("general stall", "and recieve 500k", 1,
                    70 * playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 15, 0x340);
            break;

Read full topic
